Articles.Content:
So without telling you my sob story, I made a lot of KSP videos, then lost my home and was hospitalised for a while. (None of those things are related.)

I've not made anything for a long while but recently came up with a [Kerbal/Hitman](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z7ucLlX5KhQhttp://) parody.

I'm probably going to wait for the Unity 5 update before I make anything new. However, recently I've been devoid of inspiration anyway. Does anyone have any ideas (preferably something that lasts around 2 minutes) on things they'd like to see?

Nearly 48 hours without any positive words or suggestions... What has.happened to this community?

I think I'm leaving but not before you find out how lost and alone you made me feel.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FJOzVzerweY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-31T09:18:09Z" title="07/31/2015 09:18  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 31, 2015</time> by glen.mack**
Fallout 4 Teaser? That's the only thing I can think of right now ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) But it's a lot of work though....

A while back 5thHorseman put together an absolutely fantastic teaser video for me for [Anomaly Surveyor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109471):

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-W246Iizmsg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

([thread link](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114375-A-Kerbal-Anomaly-Odyssey))

I've been thinking about putting a general call out to see if anyone was interested in doing a similar teaser/trailer for [Field Research](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123892) or [Tourism Plus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113621-1-0-4-Contract-Pack-Tourism-Plus-v1-1-8-2015-07-12). Interested?

Do a new Star Wars movie trailer.

JR
